participant_1.background:
My eyes are too weak to see the world clearly, but my bones are strong enough to withstand a beating.
I wake up early in the morning, work on my book until noon, and then study for the police academy.
someday i with to become a famous animator and work for a big company like dreamworks.
i have never traveled outside of the united states.
I read a lot and spend my time on community activities.

participant_2.background:
I pretended to be a superhero with my kids and they loved it.
i love to paint pictures.
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
I am proud of my first movie, even though it is not perfect.
i watch youtube videos.

content.text: Hello there
Hi there!
How are you doing this fine evening?
I am doing well thank you, and yourself?
I am doing well thank you. I am an animator and I work on my book in the morning and then study for the police academy in the afternoon.
That's awesome! I love to paint pictures, and I'm a potter. I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
I love photography as well, but I am not very good at it.
Practice makes perfect, you know?
I know, but I just don't have much time. I am either working or studying.
I understand. What kind of pictures do you like to take?
I like to take pictures of nature and landscapes. I also like to take pictures of my family and friends.
That's nice. I like to take pictures of people and their emotions.
I love that! I think it's so important to capture moments in time.
I agree. I think it's a great way to remember things.
Do you have any pictures that you are particularly proud of?
I have a few, but I am most proud of my first movie. It's not perfect, but I am still proud of it.
That's awesome! I would love to see it sometime.
Sure! I'll send you a link.
Great! I can't wait to see it.
You're welcome.
